name: AfterLife TeaHouse
description:
Afterlife Teahouse is a tea-making game set in a teahouse between life and death, with a relatively light and relaxing narrative. You are sitting across from your tea sensei’s ghost, who is the owner of the Afterlife Teahouse. Your sensei is looking for his successor to take charge of the teahouse because his time is running out, and he needs to find his successor before he moves on to his next life.

CONTROL:

  • MOUSE CLICK to INTERACT
  • PRESS 2 to VIEW TABLE
  • PRESS 3 to VIEW FRONT

Programming: ROKL, stevo

3D modeling: Iris

2D art: stevo, ROKL

Sound: Bryan

Narrative: Bryan & stevo

Scene&Lighting: ROKL

Game Design: Everyone 

Stevo: https://stevopineapple.itch.io/

Bryan: https://lelepancake.itch.io/

Iris: https://horsemir.itch.io/

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING.
